attributes.additional_details:
The Secretary of State for Health has appointed a Trust Special Administrator following his decision to declare South London Healthcare Trust an ‘unsustainable provider.’
We call upon him, and other relevant NHS bodies, to ensure that  this process guarantees that all the services currently provided  by the hospitals and other healthcare centres within SLHT are maintained at least at current standards, if not improved, without being privatised or outsourced, and remain accessible to patients requiring such services.

rejection.details: Please see: Save South London Healthcare NHS Trust
